downloadTitle: What's new with Microsoft Project Portfolio Management (PPM) solution
downloadDescription: Provide an overview and demonstrations of both the online and on-premise capabilities of Microsoft’s *latest* Project Portfolio Management (PPM) solution.
detailsSection: Provide an overview and demonstrations of both the online and on-premise capabilities of Microsoft’s *latest* Project Portfolio Management (PPM) solution.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office application:
    • Microsoft Office PowerPoint
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to your desired file location.
  3. Find the file where you chose to save it and double-click it to open it.
